video_title: The Question You Must Ask to Succeed #lifeimprovement #buildingconfidence #podcast
transcript:
all right so this is a really simple way
to be more successful ask yourself this
one question as many times you possibly
can per day is what I'm doing right now
getting me closer to or further from my
goals it's quite simple if the answer is
closer to your goals then keep going but
if the answer is further away from your
goals immediately stop what you're doing
and take a different action
